header.title: CosFileTransfer_File

erlref.modulesummary: This module implements the OMG CosFileTransfer::File interface.

description.p:
To get access to the record definitions for the structures use:
-include_lib("cosFileTransfer/include/*.hrl").
This module also exports the functions described in:

func.name: '_get_name'(File) -> string()
func.fsummary: Return the target object's associated name

desc.p: This read only attribute represents the target object's associated name.

func.name: '_get_complete_file_name'(File) -> string()
func.fsummary: Return the target object's associated absolute name.

desc.p: This read only attribute represents the target object's associated absolute name.
This read only attribute represents the target object's container. In some cases a NIL object will be returned.

func.name: '_get_associated_session'(File) -> FileTransferSession
func.fsummary: Return the target object's associated FileTransferSession

desc.p: This read only attribute represents the target object's associated FileTransferSession.
